Mohan Bonu

Melbourne, VIC | Open to Relocating | (61) 433974197 | 485 Temporary Graduate Visa | kiranms20@gmail.com
Full Stack Developer · Cloud Computing · Cyber Security · Data Analytics ·

I'm an energetic, solution-driven software engineer based in Melbourne, bringing over three years of hands-on experience in full-stack development, cloud engineering, and mobile applications. My background blends a Master of Information Technology (Professional) from Deakin University, majoring in Cybersecurity and Data Science, with practical expertise spanning JavaScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Spring Boot, Docker, AWS, and Kubernetes.

Whether building scalable APIs, optimizing performance for mobile-first UIs, or orchestrating CI/CD pipelines, I thrive on delivering robust solutions to real-world problems. I take pride in collaborating within cross-functional teams and mentoring peers, always eager to explore new technologies and share insights.

I’m actively seeking opportunities across software, web, and cloud development roles, fully authorized under the Temporary Graduate 485 visa to work in Australia with no restrictions. Let’s build solutions that drive technological impact together!

Experience

Software Engineer 2

Gupshup Technologies Pvt Ltd

Designed and optimized RESTful APIs and front-end interfaces, improving response times by 30% and reducing page load latency by 25%. Played a key role in building scalable, production-grade web applications using ReactJS, NodeJS, and MongoDB. Led CI/CD automation with Jenkins and Docker, cutting deployment time by 40%. Also conducted code audits to ensure compliance with security and quality standards.

Jan 2023 - Oct 2023

UI Mobile Developer

Onedirect

Built responsive and modular web applications using Angular, ReactJS, Redux, and SASS. Closely collaborated with designers and backend teams to implement feature-rich interfaces. Handled REST API integrations and utilized Redux DevTools for efficient state management. Contributed in an Agile development environment with regular code reviews, version control using Git, and testing using Postman and SQL Workbench.

Oct 2020 - Dec 2022

UI Developer Intern

Onedirect

Developed data-driven frontends that captured and visualized YouTube channel statistics using Chart.js and Google Charts. Fetched real-time content using YouTube Data APIs and stored it for analytical processing. Built UIs with Angular and Redux, and implemented RESTful service integrations to sync frontend with backend.

Feb 2020 - Sept 2020

Android App Developer Intern

Bharat Electronics Limited

Created a mobile app to visualize radar target data on Google Maps using Flutter and Firebase. The app processed and displayed coordinates and trajectories in real-time, facilitating effective field tracking. Employed Google Maps API, RESTful services, and range-bear analysis to deliver a location-intelligent tool with a single shared codebase for Android and iOS.

Jun 2019 - Jul 2019

Interests

When I’m not immersed in code, you’ll likely find me diving into a competitive match on my PlayStation - I’m an avid gamer and big fan of the esports scene. I love how gaming keeps me sharp, reactive, and engaged, just like a fast-paced dev sprint.

I’m also someone who enjoys the outdoors - trekking, exploring nature, or just going off-grid for a bit. Lately, I’ve picked up swimming and have been enjoying the mix of fitness and calm it brings. I regularly play badminton too - it’s one of my favourite ways to stay active and unwind.

Music is a constant in my life - whether I’m coding, cooking, or just relaxing, there’s always a playlist running in the background. Speaking of cooking, living as an international student in Australia pushed me to explore the kitchen more, and now I genuinely enjoy trying out new dishes and experimenting with flavours.

These interests keep me balanced and creative, and I often find that they bring a fresh perspective to my work as a developer.
